## 1. Practicing Arithmetic

```{r}
x <- c(1, 2, 3, 4, 5)
```

```{r}
y <- c(5, 4, 3, 2, 1)
```

### Addition

```{r}
x+y
```

### Subtraction

```{r}
x-y
```

### Multiplication

```{r}
x*y
```

### Division

```{r}
x/y
```
